events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to request a refund because it doesnâ€™t fit and I am not satisfied with the product.
The customer's request involves a refund related to a product return due to dissatisfaction with the item.
Assigning refund case regarding jacket return to Agent Alice for further assistance and follow-up.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket. I am here to help you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging for the return process?
My order number is 123456789. Yes, the jacket is unused and still in its original packaging, ready to be returned.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for your quick reply and for sending the shipping label. I appreciate the prompt assistance.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please send the jacket back and we will process your refund promptly upon receipt.
Just following up to confirm if the jacket has been shipped back and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I dropped off the jacket yesterday at the courier. Thanks for checking in, everything is going smoothly.
We have received the returned jacket and issued your refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
I submitted the survey and I am happy with the support I received. Thank you for resolving my issue quickly.
Closing the refund case as resolved and customer has provided positive feedback on the support received.
